author: Special Correspondent
text:
Naam Tamizhar Katchi (NTK),Puducherry unit on Monday announced that the party would contest in 28 constituencies of Union Territory in the forthcoming Assembly polls.

Except Yanam, Mahe

Talking to reporters here, the party co-ordinator Tamizhan Meeran said the party candidates would contest in the constituencies except Yanam and Mahe. The names of candidates would be announced soon with the approval of party leader.

Preference to Statehood

'He added that his party would give preference for Statehood during campaign and also said Yanam and Mahe should be ceded to Andhra Pradesh and Kerala respectively.

His party would take up a campaign against ill effects of alcohol.
title: Nam Tamizhar Katchi to contest in 28 constituencies
